column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Food wise: great. We ordered the Bosscat Fries. I like that they actually made mine extra crispy. We also ordered short stack pancake
column2: which was fluffy but not extraordinary. Typical pancake. The chicken fried steak was amazing. Flavor was spot on. The only thing I wish is they put more greens so the steak didn't look dead.
